ai.title: AI Settings

providerDesc.openai: OpenAI ChatGPT - Broad knowledge and coding ability
providerDesc.gemini: Google Gemini - Multimodal and long context support

settingsInfoList.providers: Supports multiple AI providers: Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Ollama
